New Records: Pathum Nissanka scored a half century and was the Man of the Match
Key Match Events: Dunith Wellalage took 3 wickets, Maheesh Theekshana took 3 wickets, and Matheesha Pathirana took 1 wicket for Sri Lanka
West Indies were bowled out for their 4th lowest total in T20Is
Sri Lanka leveled the series with a 73-run win
Pre-Game Insights: The match will start on Tuesday, 15 October 2024, at 7:00 PM (IST)
Sri Lanka won the toss and elected to bat
Post-Match Reflections: Charith Asalanka said the win was important for Sri Lanka and that he wants to win the series
Rovman Powell said West Indies did well to keep Sri Lanka down to 160 but that they have an opportunity to reflect on their mistakes and do well in the next game
Miscellaneous Highlights: The SL vs WI Head-to-Head Record shows that Sri Lanka and West Indies have won 8 matches each in 16 matches
Sri Lanka's spinners spun a web around the West Indian batters
